If it is the 1-hour- you do NOT have to fast. You need to eat like you regularly would for an accurate glucose reading. They have you drink the glucose to see how your body processes insulin. A reading over 130-140 could indicate gestational diabetes.If it is the 3-hour you are required to fast.

As you can see, everyone's Dr.s give different advice so I would follow what your Dr. told you, not the lab. If you are really questioning it, you can always call your Dr.s office and let them know what the lab said, and get clarification from your OB. My appointment for the 1 hour was scheduled for the morning because I was told by my Dr.s office a 4 hour fast was necessary.  Good luck!
